svg.title: Sustainable Energy and a Sustainable Environment for the 21st Century: The Role of Nuclear Power Generation

g.title: The Role of Nuclear Power Generation
g.text: The Role of Nuclear Power Generation

g.title: Professor Roger Cashmore was appointed Chairman of the UK Atomic Energy Authority in 2010. He is a Fellow of the oyal Society and in 2010 led the Royal Society working group on Nuclear Proliferation. He is a former Principal of Brasenose College in Oxford, and is a Professor of Experimental Physics in Oxford.

There are many aspects to the provision of sustainable energy and a sustainable environment, nationally and globally, in the 21st century ranging over issues of energy sources, security of supply, demand and use, cost and climate change.
